channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Clive Myrie's Italian Roadtrip
channel.desc: Staying in what was one of Naples' poorest neighbourhoods, in a hotel that's also an art gallery, Clive discovers how this always-colourful city is changing for the better. As a big fan of opera, Clive is also excited to join the cast of the Teatro San Carlo opera house in the run up to their opening night, and while in the costume department, he just can't resist trying a few things on.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Earth's Great Rivers
channel.desc: A look at the astonishing wildlife, landscapes and people of the Nile, the world's longest river. From elephants and leopards, to extreme kayakers and ancient wonders, its great length is a lifeline for astonishing wildlife and cultures.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Springwatch
channel.desc: Chris Packham and Michaela Strachan are getting to know the spring A-listers. They also report back on the wildlife antics that have been happening. Iolo Williams continues his Northern Ireland road trip by venturing out to Rathlin Island.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Jane Austen: Rise of a Genius
channel.desc: How a self-taught woman from a small English village became a great novelist.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Upstart Crow
channel.desc: Will Shakespeare takes it badly when told his new play about two sets of identical twins separated at birth and given the same names is rather far-fetched, until he decides to make it a musical. He needs help from Thomas Morley, a Tudor music legend.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.
